page.title: 07Coleshill,corner shop.
page.content: My mom and dad came to England from India in 1967.They lived in Smethick and moved to Coleshill in 1983.My name is Hardip Singh-Sidhu.My dad owns a corner shop at 105,Wingfield Rd. Coleshill.Our dog guards the shop from 11.00pm until 5.00am.We get up early, children go to school and our mom goes to our other shop in Chelmsley Wood. Dad opens at 9.30am,he stocks up,plugs in the tills and uncovers the fridges when it is quiet.It is busy near lunchtime.He closes from 1.00pm until 2.00pm.It is quiet until the children come out of school at 3.30pm .My dad fetches my mom at 6.00pm and the family look after th shop.The shop is very busy from 6.00pm until 9.00pm with people buying groceries,sweets, pop,and hoesehould materials.We close at 9.00pm,have our meal and then the dog guards the shop.
